title: AAI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 19 Apprentice Posts
description: The Airport Authority of India (AAI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 19 Graduate Apprentice, Diploma Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can also use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Mechanical, Civil, and Electrical  Engineering, can apply for the AAI Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have men...
